          <title>
            <string language="en">Bar magnet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stabmagnet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Barre aimantée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ímã de barra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Magnete di barra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγνήτης ράβδων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Imán de barra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a bar magnet, its magnetic field, and the direction of the field surrounding it.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bar magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic fields</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic poles</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Stabmagneten, 
fangen seine magnetischen und die Richtung auffangene auf,
das sie umgibt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une barre aimantée, son 
champ magnétique, et la direction de la zone l'entourant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um ímã de barra, seu 
campo magnético, e o sentido do campo que cerca o.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un magnete di barra, 
il relativo campo magnetico ed il senso del campo che lo circonda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει έναν μαγνήτη ράβδων, το 
μαγνητικό πεδίο της, και την κατεύθυνση του πεδίου που περιβάλλει
τον.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un imán de barra, su 
campo magnético, y la dirección del campo que la rodea.</string>
          </description>
